title: Ontology-Based Learning Design and Object-Integrated Educational Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Configuring customized learning environments to enhance job competencies in scientific fields

learning_goals: Analyze the relationship between learning design elements and digital learning objects using an ontology framework.
Utilize LOCO and ALOCoM ontology structures to classify and reuse learning content.
Apply the Learning Object Context Model to design personalized science education scenarios.

resources: Science Domain Digital Learning Object Library

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
